modName: The Companions Followers For Male replacer by kerwin1988
summary: This is a stand-alone replacer follower mod.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57587-1-1409188056.png[/img][/center][b][size=6]HI, everyone!![/size][/b]
First I am from Taiwan player. So my english is not very well, sorry![img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/ohdear.png[/img]
This is my first stand-alone replacer follower mod[i] [size=1]([/size][size=1]Only above the neck)[/size][/i]. So you don't need other mods to him like my image. I replacer is based on my game progress.


[center][img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57587-2-1409190414.png[/img]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57587-1-1409190414.png[/img]
I replacerd some parts hair style and face stats to make him look handsome.[/center]


[b][size=6]::: Vilkas x Farkas[/size][/b]
I've done my best, but have some little flaws of hair part. Please don't mind.[img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/facepalm.gif[/img]


[b][size=6]::: Athis[/size][/b]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57438-5-1408845922.png[/img]
 I try any method that can not be solved. Please don't mind again![img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/facepalm.gif[/img]


[b][size=6]::: Torvar[/size][/b]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57587-3-1409190414.png[/img]
I used different face textures to make him look like decadent-style.
And I replacer drunken look. Maybe look is funny...XD
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/57587-1-1409197338.png[/img]I also make clear ver you can fine in miscellaneous. Use: Cover the main file or potional file.



[b][size=6]Hope you like it...[/size][img]http://forums.nexusmods.com/public/style_emoticons/dark/wink.gif[/img][/b]
